law.catch_line: The Property Appraiser's Salary, Compensation and Benefits.

text.section:
Sec. 2-72. The Property Appraiser's Salary, Compensation and Benefits.
The salary, compensation and benefits of the Property Appraiser of Miami-Dade County for 2009 shall be one hundred fifty-three thousand dollars ($153,000.00) and he or she shall receive Class 1 Executive Benefits and thereafter salary, compensation and benefits shall be fixed annually by the Board of County Commissioners.
